alert.note: Alert for Franklin; St. Charles; St. Louis; Warren (Missouri) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS Saint Louis (Eastern Missouri and West Central Illinois)
info.headline: Severe Thunderstorm Warning issued May 14 at 5:26PM CDT until May 14 at 6:15PM CDT by NWS Saint Louis
info.description: The National Weather Service in St Louis has issued a * Severe Thunderstorm Warning for... Southwestern St. Charles County in east central Missouri... Central Franklin County in east central Missouri... Southwestern St. Louis County in east central Missouri... Southeastern Warren County in east central Missouri... * Until 615 PM CDT. * At 526 PM CDT, a severe thunderstorm was located over New Melle, moving east at 25 mph. HAZARD...60 mph wind gusts and quarter size hail. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Hail damage to vehicles is expected. Expect wind damage to roofs, siding, and trees. * Locations impacted include... O`Fallon, St. Charles, St. Peters, Chesterfield, Wildwood, Ballwin, Wentzville, Maryland Heights, Lake St. Louis, Washington, Dardenne Prairie, Eureka, Ellisville, Pacific, Weldon Spring, Cottleville, Clarkson Valley, St. Paul, Gray Summit, and Villa Ridge. This includes the following highways... Interstate 44 in Missouri between exits 251 and 266. Interstate 70 in Missouri between exits 203 and 227. This also includes Babler Memorial State Park and Route 66 State Park. HAIL THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX HAIL SIZE...1.00 IN WIND THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX WIND GUST...60 MPH
info.instruction: For your protection move to an interior room on the lowest floor of a building.

area.areaDesc: Franklin; St. Charles; St. Louis; Warren
